trans-unit.source: Provides the context in which a SharePoint command is being executed.
trans-unit.target: 提供在其中执行 SharePoint 命令的上下文。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext> is passed to the first parameter of every SharePoint command.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandContext>传递给每个 SharePoint 命令的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the log service which you can use to write messages to the **Output** window or **Error List** window in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于将消息写入 Visual Studio 中的“输出”窗口或“错误列表”窗口的日志服务。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.ISharePointCommandLogger" /> instance representing the log service.
Refreshes the context with new instances of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> and <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> 和 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 对象的新实例刷新上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> that represents the SharePoint site collection on which the command is run.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示对其运行该命令的 SharePoint 站点集合的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c>。

trans-unit.source: The SharePoint site collection on which the command is run.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 站点集合在其运行该命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that represents the SharePoint site on which the command is run.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示对其运行该命令的 SharePoint 站点的 Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The SharePoint site on which the command is run.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 站点，在其运行该命令。
